alp.core
Class LargePort

java.lang.Object
  alp.core.Port
      alp.core.LargePort

public class LargePort
extends Port

Specifies Input/Output parameters for Component and Signal. Used for components which connects multiple signals in a single port (eg. bus mux)

Version:
September, 2007
Author:
Ricardo Menotti, Author Page, DC UFSCar
See Also:
Signal, Component, Port
